entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet nuget trust command doesn't work in 8.0.0-preview.7 #34610
  • Release 7.0.400 breaks Github actions where `dotnet test` works against net462 on non-windows targets #34605
  • When Targeting .NET Framework TFM ASP.NET Core Module gets added needlessly to Web.config. #34595

Closed

  • staticwebassets.build.json' not found with Pack task for .NET v7.0.400 #34601
  • Copying unmanaged binaries as part of builds causes crashes when running after modification (macOS, Arm64) #32023

PullRequests

Created

  • When transforming web.config check if target framework is .NET Framework. #34618
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • correct command model for nuget trust command and subcommands #34613
    untriaged
  • MSBuild terminal logger enamblement. #34606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.7.0 in /eng/dependabot #34599
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.4xx
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.7.0 in /eng/dependabot #34598
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Merged

  • Revert "Allow MSBuild to use BinaryFormatter" #34402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update our TFM support and error messaging for 17.7 #34585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix redist.csproj build failure on SLN rebuild in VS #34587
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Containers: implementation of OAuth2 #34237
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
